name: Go Go Ackman 3
description:
Yet again Tenshi is hard at work on finding a way to kill off Ackman for good. But, what's this, it seems there's been a shake up in the chain of command, and now Tenshi is wanted by the Angel Police! Will Tenshi be able to clear his good name? Who's really pulling the strings here? And, most importantly, does Ackman care about any of this at all?

The last of the Ackman games, Go Go Ackman 3 makes very few changes from Go Go Ackman 2, although Tenshi is now a playable character. Both Ackman and Tenshi can be switched between at special points in a level, but they share the same health meter and weapon. Unlike Ackman Tenshi can fly, but as he is an angel he can not collect the souls of enemies he kills. Souls have changed too, and are now used as currency in shops where Ackman can buy temporary powerups or healing. Finally Ackman has lost the ability to slide enemies along the ground, but he can now move while holding a stunned enemy.

shot.caption: Title Screen.
Tenshi's hard at work on his next invention.
It still needs a little work though.
Uh, are these guys with you?
Stage 1
Ackman's on the run from the law.
He is also on the run from construction workers and animated bean bag chairs.
A shop.
The trio of Mid-boss dudes has returned.
Jennifer shows off "her" ride.
Yakimo bounces along on his unibike.
Michael is at least trying the hardest to off you, but it's still just a mid-boss kind of effort.
Jacking Michael's ride to get into the city.
Stage 1 boss attacks by shooting and ramming.
Cleared
I have just discovered new levels of terror.
Ackman makes good his escape.
Upgrading the pistol turns it full-auto.
Ackman's Stage 2 boss tosses all manner of projectiles around the screen.
Playing as Tenshi. He'll have to avoid some of the guards here.
Or he can just fly over them all.
Tenshi's boss switches it up between flamethrowers, automatic guns,and rocket launchers.
Ackman and Tenshi have joined forces? This calls for desperate measures.
In the edutainment portion of the game we learn that, like a crocodile, a shark's jaw can be held shut with only a minimum of force(this is not at all true).
Just like a real married couple Ackman and Majo have their occasional lovers' quarrels.
You got any Mountain Dew?
Ackman and Tenshi journey into the caves to swipe this guy's swell ride...
...then they take it to the open water for some Mode 7 shooter action.
It's more frightened of us then we are of it (barely)
Ackman crosses the jungle in style.
Hey guys, long time no see.
Ackman briefly transitions to an overhead view as he searches for a missing pair of glasses.
Unfortunately all the commotion draws the attention of the mother hen.
Don't mind us, we're just here to kill your boss.
Game Over.
